example.text: He takes these positions because he knows it would be aiding and abetting the enemy for America to look the other way. To do nothing is essentially choosing to side with Russia over Ukraine.

As we recognize #NationalPoliceWeek, I am honored to introduce the bipartisan Law Enforcement Training for Mental Health Crisis Response Act with my Oklahoma colleague [[user]]. Our nation owes a deep debt of gratitude to our law enforcement and corrections officers. [[url]]
New institutions for the common defense of liberty, including NATO, were founded. The US Marshall Plan helped to secure and rebuild a war-torn but free Europe, and both America and liberty prospered.
As Ohio families struggle to keep up with inflation, put food on the table, and pay for childcare, FirstEnergy is squeezing consumers to pay for its criminal behavior. For shame.

Today I spoke about the dangerous situation in some rail corridors across America and the many clear and sometimes deadly impacts on students across our nation. We must look to the future and join together to protect the public, our students, our rail workers and our communities. [[url]]
America stands with our Allies to strengthen democracy, and realize in our time and generation a free, sovereign, and independent Ukraine. Slava Ukraini!

Recent [[user]] guidance allowing solar developers to qualify for a 10% "domestic content" bonus under the #InflationReductionAct while using foreign subcomponents rewards those who cut corners, and we cannot reward bad behavior. Made in the USA, needs to mean made in the USA. [[url]]
